name: Motorcycle Riding Hero
description:
A game made for "THE Superheroes and Supervillains Game Jam!" hosted by at37.

Sadly, this is quite badly put together, but hopefully some enjoyment can still be gained from this.

In this game, you are Terry Holder, a motorcycle rider that gets captured and turned into a cyborg against your will before your friends save you. You fight another cyborg.

W and A or arrow keys for left and right.

Spacebar or K for attacking.
